pages.text: Here are a few tips to help keep you alive longer in the depths of the $(thing)Abyss$()
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(thing)Web Reapers$() can be empowered by using $(thing)Nightmare Flakes$() on them, causing them to grow and become more powerful. Using an $(thing)Enchanted Book$() of any kind on one will give you a $(thing)Book of Shadows$()
